content:
Hello,

I'm trying to understand how file tags fit into the overall metadata paradigm with Dataverse. I see you can get them when using the API and grabbing a dataset, but are they exported at all with any metadata standards? How do folks approach thinking about file tags? Do folks use the file tags outside the DV system?

Thanks!
Bethany
The show up with the "JSON" export as "categories". I'm not sure about the other exports.
